summary: Reviewer gate: Lane A cleared. Real sysinfo sensor coherence flows through the PhiIR evaluator. The Healing Bed breathes on live CPU/memory data. healing_bed.phi runs and breaks stream when coherence reaches threshold. Two-run proof: 0.9801Hz and 0.9800Hz — neither is the mock constant 0.618. Phase 10 is complete.

verification.fail_first_confirmed: error[E0425]: cannot find function evaluate_with_coherence — gate held before implementation
verification.sensors_real: Run1: 0.9801Hz | Run2: 0.9800Hz — live variance confirmed, not mock constant
verification.stream_termination: Stream broken: healing_bed — both runs terminated correctly at threshold
verification.mock_resolution: sensors.rs was overwritten by Antigravity concurrent write during Phase 10 execution — restored by Codex with real implementation
